name: Faster (itch) (Simun Golub)
description: Faster is a video game intended for 7th and 8th grade students. The user learns the laws of friction, acceleration and inertia in an interesting and fun way. The goal of the video game is for the car to reach the end of an exciting track without crashing into an obstacle that awaits it at the end and manages to brake in time using the knowledge of physics.
